title: Address Change
description: Update a citizen's district when they move to a new neighborhood using UPDATE statement.
story: Alice Johnson is moving from Downtown to Uptown. Update her district in the database to reflect the change.
hint: Use UPDATE citizens SET district = 'Uptown' WHERE name = 'Alice Johnson'. Always use WHERE to target specific records!
tableSetup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS citizens CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE citizens (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100), age INT, district VARCHAR(50));
INSERT INTO citizens (name, age, district) VALUES ('Alice Johnson', 28, 'Downtown'), ('Bob Smith', 35, 'Uptown'), ('Charlie Brown', 42, 'Midtown');
